english.segment1: This city doesnt sleep at night. At ten oclock it comes alive. Theres 20 million people, then theres me. A taxi driver every day. A lot of work, a little pay. Just looking for a way to find some peace
english.segment2: But finding peace. Is way too hard. When youre looking in the dark
english.segment3: So shine, shine, shine on us. Oh God, we need Your love. These streets arent bright enough. Oh Jesus, shine on us
english.segment4: Im sitting on this corner here. My dignity just disappears. With every coin I beg into this cup. No matter how much people pay. It doesnt matter anyway. It never ever seems to be enough
english.segment5: The light inside. My heavy heart. Is getting way too dark
english.segment6: So shine, shine, shine on us. Oh God, we need Your love. These streets arent bright enough. Oh Jesus, shine on us
english.segment7: God above is full of mercy. Turning darkness into dawn. All you who are weak and weary. Lift your heads and sing this song
english.segment8: Shine, shine, shine on us. Oh God, we need Your love. These streets arent bright enough. Oh Jesus, shine on us
